message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? It's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I'm not sure I can meet you at $10,000, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but I really think that's the highest I can go. Can you consider that?
